changeSet.author: tamnc
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE file_metadata_entity ( id varchar(255) NOT NULL, date_uploaded timestamp(6) NULL, http_content_type varchar(255) NULL, original_name varchar(255) NULL, size bigint(20) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) );

changeSet.author: tamnc
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `account-service`.`media` ( `id` BIGINT(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `type` VARCHAR(45) NULL, `title` VARCHAR(500) NULL, `url` VARCHAR(500) NULL, `content_type` VARCHAR(45) NULL, `object_type` VARCHAR(45) NULL, `object_id` BIGINT(20) NULL, `thumbnail_path` VARCHAR(500) NULL, `thumbnail_url` VARCHAR(500) NULL, `path` VARCHAR(500) NULL, `created_date` DATETIME NULL, `created_by` VARCHAR(45) NULL, `updated_date` DATETIME NULL, `updated_by` VARCHAR(45) NULL, `status` int, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) );

changeSet.author: tamnc
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `account-service`.`address` ( `id` BIGINT(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `full_address` VARCHAR(45) NULL, `customer_id` BIGINT(20) NULL, `created_date` DATETIME NULL, `created_by` VARCHAR(45) NULL, `updated_date` DATETIME NULL, `updated_by` VARCHAR(45) NULL, `status` int, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) );
